item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Dodie Smith
item.description: "Only half a page left now. Shall I fill it with 'I love you, I love you'-- like father's page of cats on the mat? No. Even a broken heart doesn't warrant a waste of good paper." -- Dodie Smith

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Dodie Smith
item.description: "I have really sinned. I am going to pause now, and sit here on the mound repenting in deepest shame..." -- Dodie Smith

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Dodie Smith
item.description: "I was wandering around as usual, in my unpleasantly populated sub-conscious..." -- Dodie Smith

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Catdwm add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde
